description: This file defines a Flutter widget called AppShell, which manages bottom navigation for switching between different screens (Home, Search, Orders, Account) within the mobile app.

classes.name: AppShell
classes.description: A StatefulWidget that provides a scaffold with bottom navigation to switch between main screens.

classes.name: _AppShellState
classes.description: State class managing the index of the currently selected page and building the UI accordingly.

methods.name: createState
methods.description: Creates the mutable state for the AppShell widget.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Constructs the widget's UI, displaying the current page and bottom navigation bar.
